ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Propose / Quote" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Propose / Quote'), OR ( ISBLANK( Quotation_Issued__c), NOT(Export_Control_Check__c), ISBLANK(Quotation_Number__c), NOT(Proposal_price_Authorized__c), ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), ISBLANK(Application__c), ISPICKVAL(Category_of_Interest__c,""), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark 'Propose / Quote' stage, fill in these fields: Amount, Application, Category of Interest, Competition Positioning, Export Control Check, Quotation Issued, Quotation Number, Proposal price Authorized and RFQ Received Date.
